item.title: Airbnb's Coolest Tiny Houses in America
item.description:
Airbnb's Coolest Tiny Houses in America

Tiny homes are all the rage, so it makes perfect sense that tiny homes people list on Airbnb are also quite popular. And that's…

item.title: Grand Café de Tropen, Amsterdam, Netherlands
item.description:
Grand Café de Tropen, Amsterdam, Netherlands

To be frank, Amsterdam's Koninklijk Instituut voor de Tropen, more informally known as the Royal Tropical Institute, is not the first place you'd think of for a lunch of pulled chicken marinated in hoi-sin and star anise. The stately Dutch Gothic Revival pile was designed by J.J.

item.title: A Giant Galaxy Orbiting Our Own Just Appeared Out of Nowhere
item.description:
A Giant Galaxy Orbiting Our Own Just Appeared Out of Nowhere

Researchers scanning the skies just got a big surprise. They spotted a humongous galaxy orbiting our own, where none had been seen before. It appeared, seemingly, out of nowhere. So, just how did the newly-discovered Crater 2 manage to pull off this feat, like a deer leaping from the interstellar bushes to stare us down through our collective headlights?

item.title: Why Sleep Is So Important For Overall Health
item.description:
Why Sleep Is So Important For Overall Health

Around the world, human beings have sleep deficit. Learn why getting the right amount of rest can revitalize your body and lead to overall increase in health and wellness. With an estimated 60 million Americans suffering from insomnia, sleep is something many of us are lacking.

item.title: Techies Project by Photographer Helena Price
item.description:
Techies Project by Photographer Helena Price

The two words "Silicon Valley" immediately stir up stereotypes, stigma and maybe an HBO show. The name has become a cultural reflex, and that's what photographer Helena Price wants to change with her ambitious, large-scale portrait and interview series. Techies Project, launched today, is a collection of 100 in-depth interviews that breaks this idea of the "sameness" plaguing the area.

item.title: 'Femton': an organic workout collection from Ali Safa A and Analogue Ways.
item.description:
'Femton': an organic workout collection from Ali Safa A and Analogue Ways.

Drawing inspiration from long, cold winters in Sweden spent cooped up indoors comes a new collection of workout gear designed by industrial design student Ali Safa A. Named 'Femton', the collection strives to alter public perceptions of exercise equipment while aiming to encourage healthy living and raise environmental awareness.

item.title: Updating LA's Historic Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel
item.description:
Updating LA's Historic Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel

On the roster of storied LA hotels, The Hollywood Roosevelt ranks high on the list, with its blend of Old Hollywood lore and allure. From The Tower to The Cabanas beside their David Hockney-painted pool, the entire property has played host to private parties and even more private conversations that would ultimately impact the surrounding city.

item.title: Food & Beer (Pre-order) | Food & Cookery | Phaidon Store
item.description:
Food & Beer (Pre-order) | Food & Cookery | Phaidon Store

The debut book by Danish gypsy brewer Jeppe Jarnit-Bjergsø of the bar Tørst, and Canadian chef Daniel Burns of the Michelin-starred restaurant Luksus-both in a shared space in Greenpoint, Brooklyn where they elevate beer to the level of wine in fine dining.

item.title: What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3
item.description:
What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3

HAWTHORNE, California - I've had a terrible flu all week. My body aches, my head is pounding, and my throat feels like it might fall out of my neck. Right now, though, I'm riding in the Tesla Model 3, one of the most hotly anticipated cars in the world...

item.title: Paint With Fire Using This Virtual Reality App
item.description:
Paint With Fire Using This Virtual Reality App

Vocativ uses intelligent technology, smart journalists and the wisdom of the crowd to find story leads and angles no other news organization can.
